description:
“Someone please help me… love me…”

Born as a rare sort of Omega, he lived in government asylum. He was determined to spend the rest of his days alone and not to marry anyone.

How did this president suddenly appear in his life!?

Even though it was their first meeting, their bodies were aching and wrapped in a sweet scent, and then the two of them…

[An Omegaverse office love story that depicts the lovey-dovey married life of a caring and doting seme x a naive new recruit uke.]>
